verses.verse: O <S%G5599><s%> foolish <S%G453><s%> Galatians <S%G1052><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> hath bewitched <S%G940><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that ye should <S%G3982><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>, before <S%G2596><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath been evidently set forth <S%G4270><s%>, crucified <S%G4717><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>?

This <S%G5124><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I learn <S%G3129><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, Received ye <S%G2983><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the hearing <S%G189><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>?

Are ye <S%G2075><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> foolish <S%G453><s%>? having begun <S%G1728><s%> in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, are ye <S%G2005><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> made perfect <S%G2005><s%> by the flesh <S%G4561><s%>?
Have ye suffered <S%G3958><s%> so many things <S%G5118><s%> in vain <S%G1500><s%>? if it be yet <S%G1489><s%> <S%G2532><s%> in vain <S%G1500><s%>.

He therefore <S%G3767><s%> that ministereth <S%G2023><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worketh <S%G1754><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, doeth he it by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the hearing <S%G189><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>?
Even as <S%G2531><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it was accounted <S%G3049><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Know ye <S%G1097><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they which are of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%>, foreseeing <S%G4275><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> would justify <S%G1344><s%> the heathen <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, preached before the gospel <S%G4283><s%> unto Abraham <S%G11><s%>, saying <S%G3754><s%>, In <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> shall <S%G1757><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> be blessed <S%G1757><s%>.
So then <S%G5620><s%> they which be of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> are blessed <S%G2127><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the curse <S%G2671><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Cursed <S%G1944><s%> is every one <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> continueth <S%G1696><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> in the sight <S%G3844><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, it is evident <S%G1212><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%>, The just <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: but <S%G235><s%>, The man <S%G444><s%> that doeth <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath redeemed <S%G1805><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the curse <S%G2671><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, being made <S%G1096><s%> a curse <S%G2671><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Cursed <S%G1944><s%> is every one <S%G3956><s%> that hangeth <S%G2910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a tree <S%G3586><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the blessing <S%G2129><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%> might come <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we might receive <S%G2983><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, I speak <S%G3004><s%> after the manner of <S%G2596><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; Though it be but <S%G3676><s%> a man's <S%G444><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%>, yet if it be confirmed <S%G2964><s%>, no man <S%G3762><s%> disannulleth <S%G114><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> addeth thereto <S%G1928><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> were <S%G4483><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> made <S%G4483><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> to seeds <S%G4690><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>, that the covenant <S%G1242><s%>, that was confirmed before <S%G4300><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the law <S%G3551><s%>, which was <S%G1096><s%> four hundred <S%G5071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> after <S%G3326><s%>, cannot <S%G3756><s%> disannul <S%G208><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> it should make <S%G2673><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of none effect <S%G2673><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the inheritance <S%G2817><s%> be of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, it is no more <S%G3765><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G5483><s%> it to Abraham <S%G11><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> serveth the law <S%G3551><s%>? It was added <S%G4369><s%> because of <S%G5484><s%> transgressions <S%G3847><s%>, till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> the promise was made <S%G1861><s%>; and it was ordained <S%G1299><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of a mediator <S%G3316><s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> a mediator <S%G3316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a mediator of one <S%G1520><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>.

Is the law <S%G3551><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>? God forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there had been <S%G1325><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> have given life <S%G2227><s%>, verily <S%G3689><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> should <S%G302><s%> have been <S%G2258><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> hath concluded <S%G4788><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might be given <S%G1325><s%> to them that believe <S%G4100><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, we were kept <S%G5432><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, shut up <S%G4788><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which should afterwards <S%G3195><s%> be revealed <S%G601><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> schoolmaster <S%G3807><s%> to bring us unto <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we might be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> after that faith <S%G4102><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%>, we are <S%G2070><s%> no longer <S%G2089><s%> <S%G3765><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a schoolmaster <S%G3807><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> as many of you as <S%G3745><s%> have been baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> have put on <S%G1746><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

There is <S%G1762><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> Jew <S%G2453><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> Greek <S%G1672><s%>, there is <S%G1762><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> bond <S%G1401><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> free <S%G1658><s%>, there is <S%G1762><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> male <S%G730><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> female <S%G2338><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> be Christ's <S%G5547><s%>, then <S%G686><s%> are ye <S%G2075><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the promise <S%G1860><s%>.
